articles.content: WASHINGTON (NewsNation Now) The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission announced the recall of more than 400,000 bottles of Excedrin products because some of the bottles containing the over-the-coun… [+1270 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Oil prices up as Britain, EU reach post-Brexit deal before deadline - Fox Business
articles.description: Oil prices inched higher on Thursday, helped by late-day buying in a low-volume session to close out the week.
articles.content:
CALGARY, Alberta/LONDON - Oil prices inched higher on Thursday, helped by late-day buying in a low-volume session to close out the week.
